title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         The Fee Booth and entrance to Appomattox Court House National Historical Park NPS Photo  Beginning Jan. 2, 2016, the Visitor Center is open daily from 9:00 a.m. to 5 p.m.  -with the exception of closures on the following federal holidays during the winter:  Thanksgiving, Christmas Day, and New Years Day.   Please allow at least two hours to visit the historical village!    In case of bad weather or emergency closure conditions dial: 434-352-8987 x 245
